text: Microsoft universal app strategy…   I’m scared and excited at the same time.  <http://www.windowscentral.com/microsofts-universal-app-strategy-windows-10-shown-mwc-2015-video>

attachments.title: Microsoft's universal app strategy for Windows 10 shown off in MWC 2015 video
attachments.text: Microsoft's Windows 10 universal app presentation at the Mobile World Congress 2015 trade show earlier this month has finally been posted in video form, with the company going over their strategy for giving developers a way to make an app that will work across all Windows 10-based devices. The video, posted on Microsoft's Channel 9 site, shows how Windows 10 apps will be able to...

text: one app/binary that runs on phone, desktop, xbox, tablet
MSFT is dogfooding it - which potentially means you could run Office on your xbox - not that you would want to, but technically speaking you could.
I wonder what their “AutoLayout” engine is like compared to Apple's
